mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, m.ma_id, m.ma_name, m.ma_qty, o.order_vat,o.order_sum ,o.order_date, o.due_date, o.order_emp, o.order_qty, m.shelt_position,m.unit_cost FROM material m, orders o WHERE m.ma_id = o.ma_id
mapper.insert: insert into orders (order_id, ma_id, order_qty, order_sum, order_vat, order_emp, order_date,due_date,in_date) values (#{order_id}, #{ma_id}, #{order_qty}, #{order_sum},#{order_vat}, #{order_emp},#{order_date},#{due_date},#{in_date})
